TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 讓 控制項能夠序列化。

span.span: Enables serialization of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會公開為屬性的根類別。This class is exposed as the property of the root class. 序列化儲存圖表的狀態，同時也提供將序列化的資料載入至圖表的選項。Serialization saves the state of the chart and also provides the option to load the serialized data into the chart. 可保存所有圖表屬性，包括圖表的資料。All chart properties can be persisted, including the chart's data. 此外，可以重設所有標示為進行序列化的圖表屬性。In addition, all chart properties marked for serialization can be reset. 管理使用者定義的檢視狀態時，可以選擇性地使用這個類別。This class can optionally be used when managing user-defined view state. 其中一個其`Load`方法可以用來載入檢視狀態，以及其中一個`Save`設定檢視狀態時，就可以使用方法。One of its `Load` methods can be used to load the view state, and one of the `Save` methods can be used when setting the view state. XML 或二進位格式可用來儲存序列化資料。The XML or binary formats can be used to store serialized data. 根據預設，使用 XML，但是您可以變更與格式屬性。XML is used by default, but you can change the format with the property. 儲存圖表屬性，並使用載入`Save`和`Load`方法，分別。Chart properties are saved and loaded using the `Save` and `Load` methods, respectively. 請注意，只有具有非預設值的屬性將會儲存。Note that only properties with non-default values will be saved. 資料可以儲存和/或使用檔案，載入資料流， ，和物件。Data can be saved and/or loaded using a file, stream, , , and objects. 當儲存及/或使用物件的資料載入衍生自， ，或類別，資料的格式必須是 XML。When saving and/or loading data using an object derived from the , , or classes, the format of the data must be XML. 下列清單說明三項技術，從基本到進階，用來定義可序列化的資料。The following list describes three techniques, from basic to advanced, used to define serializable data. 請注意，您也可以定義不可序列化的資料。Note that it is also possible to define non-serializable data. 這項技術是由下一個段落所述。This technique is described in the next paragraph. - 序列化使用`Save`和`Load`方法，而不指定任何可序列化的屬性。Serialize the using the `Save` and `Load` methods, without specifying any serializable properties. 所有圖表屬性，使用非預設值，其中包含圖表的資料，將會都序列化。All chart properties with non-default values, which includes chart data, will be serialized. - 序列化所指定的圖表屬性屬性。Serialize the chart properties specified by the property. 屬性群組的圖表屬性序列化成類別目錄，例如資料、 外觀及其他等等。The property groups the chart properties to be serialized into categories such as Data, Appearance, and so forth. 請注意，名稱和自動序列化物件，序列化的資料然後套用至現有的圖表區域和載入時的序列。Note that the names of and objects are automatically serialized; the serialized data is then applied to existing chart areas and series when loaded. > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性在內部實作控制項作為屬性The property is implemented internally by the control as the property - 圖表屬性所指定的序列化屬性。Serialization of chart properties specified by the property. 這是以逗號分隔的清單都是可序列化的所有圖表屬性。This is a comma-separated listing of all chart properties that are serializable. 這個屬性設為明確的值之後，就可以指定要儲存的所有屬性的開發人員的責任。After this property is set to an explicit value, it is the responsibility of the developer to specify all properties to be saved. 也就是說，不同於屬性中，圖表區域和數列的名稱不會自動保存。In other words, unlike the property, the names of chart areas and series will not be automatically persisted. 和屬性也可以用於搭配使用。The and properties can also be used in conjunction. 不過，請確定設定，否則為所指定的圖表屬性時，會將與本身串連屬性將會覆寫。However, make sure that is concatenated with itself when being set, otherwise the chart properties specified by the property will be overridden. 若要禁止特定屬性進行序列化，使用屬性。To prohibit certain properties from being serialized, use the property. 當一個屬性會設定為可序列化，並不可序列化的這是常見萬用字元使用時，屬性的優先順序。When one property is set as serializable and non-serializable, which is common when wildcards are used, the property has precedence. 不過，優先順序也取決於指定的屬性時，已使用多少的萬用字元。However, precedence also depends on how many wildcards were used when a property was specified. 根據預設，可序列化的屬性會設為預設值重設，然後才載入。By default, serializable properties are reset to their defaults before they are loaded. 可以變更此行為，使用屬性。This behavior can be changed using the property. 方法也可用來明確地重設為其預設值的圖表屬性。The method can also be used to explicitly reset chart properties to their default values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents Content { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定要序列化之圖表內容的類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of chart content to be serialized.

value.span: 列舉值，表示將在載入、儲存或重設作業期間序列化的圖表內容。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the chart content that will be serialized during a load, save or reset operation.

value.span: 根據預設，所有的非預設圖表屬性都會保存，包括資料。

span.span: By default, all non-default chart properties, including data, are persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，所有圖表屬性會都序列化任何時`Save`和`Load`方法受到呼叫。By default, all chart properties will be serialized when any of the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 若要提供進一步控制序列化移轉功能，請使用屬性。To provide more control over what is serialized, use the property. 請注意，並屬性也可用連同屬性。Note that the and properties can also be used along with the property. **重要**屬性會決定類型的圖表的特性，例如 「 外觀 」，進行序列化，而且實際上為內部實作屬性。**Important** The property determines types of chart characteristics, such as "appearance", to be serialized, and is actually implemented internally as the property. 這表示屬性，然後設定屬性將會導致屬性值所覆寫時，除非串連。This means that setting the property and then setting the property will result in the property value being overridden, unless is concatenated. 查看範例程式碼下方，如需此程序的範例。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 如果您設定屬性，所有和將自動序列化物件名稱; 這表示相關圖表區域和系列的序列化的資料將會套用到現有的物件，載入時。If you set the property, all and objects names will automatically be serialized; this means that serialized data that pertains to chart areas and series will be applied to existing objects when loaded. 設定這個屬性會影響所有的負載，儲存及重設作業。Setting this property affects all load, save and reset operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat Format { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定序列化圖表時使用的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the format used when the chart is serialized.

value.span: 列舉值，表示序列化資料的格式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the format of the serialized data.
The default value is XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以 XML 或二進位格式序列化資料。Data can be serialized in either an XML or binary format. 二進位格式精簡，並會比 XML 更少儲存體。Binary format is compact, and takes less storage than XML. XML，不過，是人類看得懂的文字格式。XML, however, is a text format that is human-readable. 當您儲存或載入序列化的資料時，格式必須是 XML。When you save or load serialized data, the format must be XML.

MemberSignature.Value: protected string GetContentString (System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents content, bool serializable);

param.name: serializable
param.span: 表示要取得可序列化的字串， 則表示要取得不可序列化的字串。

returns.span: 值，表示可序列化或不可序列化的類別和 (或) 屬性名稱。

span.span: A value that represents the serializable or non-serializable class and/or property names.

summary.span: 將序列化資料載入 控制項中。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 衍生自 類別的物件，例如 物件。

span.span: An object derived from the class, for example, a object.

summary.span: 從衍生自 類別的物件，將序列化資料載入控制項中。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來序列化資料載入控制項。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 當載入作業發生時，可序列化的屬性，根據預設，第一次重設為其預設值之前已設定為保存的值，如果儲存。When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要變更此行為，請使用屬性。To change this behavior, use the property. 根據預設，將會載入所有序列化的圖表屬性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 若要載入特定的序列化的屬性，設定，或載入資料之前的屬性。To load specific serialized properties, set the , or properties before loading the data. 請注意，當資料會儲存使用`Save`實際序列化方法，只有在具有非預設值的屬性。Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.IO.TextReader reader) cil managed

param.name: reader
param.span: 衍生自 抽象類別的讀取器，例如 。

span.span: A reader, such as , that is derived from the abstract class.

summary.span: 從衍生自 類別的讀取器物件，將序列化資料載入控制項中。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from a reader object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來序列化資料載入控制項。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 當載入作業發生時，預設可序列化的屬性會先重設為其預設值之前已設定為保存的值，如果儲存。When a load operation occurs, by default the serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要變更此行為，請使用屬性。To change this behavior, use the property. 根據預設，將會載入所有序列化的圖表屬性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 藉由設定，或才能載入內容，一組特定的屬性。By setting the , or properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded. 如果您使用這個定義，請注意，格式為，藉由設定屬性，必須是 XML。If you use this definition, note that the format, which is set by the property, must be XML.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(string fileName) cil managed

param.name: fileName

param.span: 如果指定相對路徑，此路徑將相對於目前的目錄。

span.span: If a relative path is specified, the path will be relative to the current directory.

span.span: Loads serialized data saved to disk into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來序列化資料載入控制項。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 當載入作業發生時，可序列化的屬性，根據預設，第一次重設為其預設值之前已設定為保存的值，如果儲存。When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要變更此行為，請使用屬性。To change this behavior, use the property. 根據預設，將會載入所有序列化的圖表屬性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 若要載入特定的序列化的屬性，設定，或載入資料之前的屬性。To load specific serialized properties, set the , or properties before loading the data. 請注意，當資料會儲存使用`Save`實際序列化方法，只有在具有非預設值的屬性。Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.

param.name: reader
param.span: 要從中讀取保存資料的物件。

summary.span: 從衍生自 類別的物件，將序列化資料載入控制項中。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來序列化資料載入控制項。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 當載入作業發生時，預設可序列化的屬性會先重設為其預設值之前已設定為保存的值，如果儲存。When a load operation occurs, by default serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要變更此行為，請使用屬性。To change this behavior, use the property. 根據預設，將會載入所有序列化的圖表屬性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 如果您設定，或才能載入內容，一組特定的屬性。If you set the , or properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded. 當您使用這個定義時，格式必須是 XML;格式可以變更與屬性。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be changed with the property. 當您使用 XML 格式的文字檔案，為了簡單起見使用方法改為。When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NonSerializableContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NonSerializableContent : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定不會序列化的圖表屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the chart properties that will not be serialized.

value.span: 以逗號分隔的 運算式，表示不會序列化的圖表屬性。

span.span: A comma-separated expression that represents the chart properties that will not be serialized.
The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設所有圖表屬性都會序列化的時機`Save`和`Load`方法受到呼叫。By default all chart properties will be serialized when the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 您可以使用屬性來限制要序列化，以及與圖表特性和屬性。You can use the property to limit chart characteristics to be serialized, along with the and properties. 此屬性會決定哪一個圖表特性不會序列化。This property determines which chart characteristics will not be serialized. 可以在字串運算式中，使用萬用字元，以相同方式屬性。Wildcards can be used in the string expression, in the same manner as the property. 例如，若要排除所有圖表`BackColor`屬性從序列化，將此屬性設定為"\*。BackColor"。For example, to exclude all chart `BackColor` properties from serialization, set this property to "\*.BackColor". 某些情況下，屬性可以設為序列化和不序列化時，使用萬用字元時，這很常見。Sometimes, a property can be set to be both serialized and not serialized, which is common when wildcards are used. 運算式具有較低的優先權，相較於運算式。The expression has a lower priority when compared to the expression. 不過，請注意，較少的權重會使用萬用字元的字串運算式。However, note that less weight is given to string expressions that use wildcards. 例如，如果屬性設定為"\*。背景色彩 」 以及屬性設定為，所有 B`ackColor`屬性，但會將物件序列化。For example, if the property is set to "\*.BackColor" and the property is set to , all B`ackColor` properties except for objects will be serialized. 如果屬性已設定，優先順序取決於用於多少萬用字元運算式。If the property has been set, the priority depends on how many wild cards are used in the expression. 例如，設定屬性，以將會導致屬性包含"*。上一步\*[運算式]。For example, setting the property to will result in the property containing a "*.Back\*" expression. 如果屬性設定為"\*。上一步\*"，則所有`Back*`這類圖表屬性`BackColor`， `BackGradient`，依此類推，則仍會序列化。If the property is set to "\*.Back\*", all `Back*` chart properties such as `BackColor`, `BackGradient`, and so forth, will still be serialized. 這是因為屬性值具有更高的優先權，相較於屬性。This is because the property value has higher priority when compared to the property. 所有儲存時，這個屬性會影響載入及重設作業。This property affects all save, load and reset operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重設所有標記為即將序列化的圖表屬性。

span.span: Resets all chart properties marked for serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個方法會重設所有圖表屬性，為其預設值。By default, this method resets all chart properties to their default values. 若要限制會重設為其預設值的圖表屬性，請使用，和屬性。To limit the chart properties that are reset to their defaults, use the , and properties. 請注意，這個方法也稱為自動當`Load`方法可用，屬性設定為`true`。Note that this method is also called automatically when a `Load` method is used and the property is set to `true`.

summary.span: 儲存具有非預設值的圖表屬性。

span.span: Saves chart properties that have non-default values.

summary.span: 所有圖表屬性都能序列化，包括資料。

span.span: All chart properties can be serialized; this includes data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 衍生自 類別且用來儲存圖表屬性的物件，例如 。

span.span: An object derived from the class, such as , that is used to save chart properties.

summary.span: 將具有非預設值的圖表資料和屬性儲存至衍生自 類別的物件。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to an object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當呼叫這個方法時，將會序列化所有圖表屬性，使用非預設值，其中包含資料點。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制要序列化的圖表特性，請使用，和屬性。To control chart characteristics to be serialized, use the , and properties. 如果這個方法用來儲存為範本的外觀屬性，請確定的屬性物件第一次設定`true`之前呼叫這個方法。If this method is used to save appearance properties as a template, make sure that the property of the object is first set to `true` before calling this method. 序列化的圖表做為範本，就會發生以不同的方式從非範本序列化;範本序列化著重在外觀屬性。Serialization of a chart as a template occurs differently from non-template serialization; template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties. 當範本序列化時，方法可以用來載入範本，若要提供圖表的外觀屬性。When a template is serialized, the method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart. 範本可用來模擬自訂調色盤。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.TextWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 衍生自 類別且用來儲存圖表屬性的物件，例如 。

span.span: An object derived from class, for example, , that is used to save chart properties.

summary.span: 將具有非預設值的圖表資料和屬性儲存至衍生自 類別的指定物件。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當呼叫這個方法時，將會序列化所有圖表屬性，使用非預設值，其中包含資料點。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 以控制哪些圖表特性序列化時，使用，和屬性。To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the , and properties. 當您使用這個定義時，格式必須是 XML;格式可以使用設定屬性。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be set with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(string fileName) cil managed

param.name: fileName
param.span: 用於儲存序列化資料之檔案的相對或絕對路徑。

span.span: The relative or absolute path of the file used to store the serialized data.

param.span: 請注意，如果指定相對路徑，此路徑將相對於目前的目錄。

span.span: Note that if a relative path is specified, the path will be relative to the current directory.

summary.span: 將具有非預設值的圖表資料和屬性儲存至指定的檔案。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當呼叫這個方法時，將會序列化所有圖表屬性，使用非預設值，其中包含資料點。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制圖表的特性，以可序列化使用，和屬性。To control chart characteristics to be serialized use the , and properties. 依預設是以 XML 格式儲存資料。By default data is saved in an XML format. 若要以二進位格式儲存資料，請使用屬性。To save the data in a binary format, use the property. 請注意，必須啟用檔案儲存所在的目錄的寫入權限。Note that Write permissions must be enabled for the directory in which the file is stored. 根據預設，這是應用程式的 Bin 資料夾。By default, this is the Bin folder of the application. 如果這個方法來儲存為範本的外觀屬性，請確定屬性會先設定為`true`之前呼叫這個方法。If this method is being used to save Appearance properties as a template, make sure that the property is first set to `true` before calling this method. 序列化的圖表做為範本的進行方式從非範本序列化，主要是因為範本序列化著重在外觀屬性。Serialization of a chart as a template proceeds differently from non-template serialization, primarily because template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties. 當範本序列化時，方法可以用來載入範本，若要提供圖表的外觀屬性。When a template is serialized, the method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart. 範本可用來模擬自訂調色盤。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 衍生自 且用來儲存 屬性的物件。

span.span: An object derived from used to save properties.

summary.span: 將具有非預設值的圖表資料和屬性儲存至衍生自 類別的指定物件。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當呼叫這個方法時，將會序列化所有圖表屬性，使用非預設值，其中包含資料點。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 以控制哪些圖表特性序列化時，使用，和屬性。To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the , and properties. 當您使用這個定義時，格式必須是 XML;格式可以變更與屬性。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be changed with the property. 當您使用 XML 格式的文字檔案，為了簡單起見使用方法改為。When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SerializableContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SerializableContent : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可以序列化的圖表屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the chart properties that can be serialized.

value.span: 以逗號分隔的 運算式，表示要序列化的圖表屬性。

span.span: A comma-separated expression that represents the chart properties to be serialized.
The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設所有圖表屬性都會序列化的時機`Save`和`Load`方法受到呼叫。By default all chart properties will be serialized when the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 您可以使用屬性來限制要序列化，以及與圖表特性和屬性。You can use the property to limit chart characteristics to be serialized, along with the and properties. 屬性會決定要序列化的圖表特性。The property determines which chart characteristics will be serialized. 可以在字串運算式中，使用萬用字元，以相同方式屬性。Wildcards can be used in the string expression, in the same manner as the property. 例如，若要序列化所有圖表`BackColor`屬性，將此屬性設定為"\*。BackColor"。For example, to serialize all chart `BackColor` properties, set this property to "\*.BackColor". 如果及/或子屬性會指定，則所有的名稱並以啟用要套用到現有保存的資料必須也指定物件和物件;也就是說，您必須指定"Series.Name"和"ChartArea.Name 」 運算式。If and/or child properties are specified, then the names of all and objects must be also specified to enable the persisted data to be applied to existing and objects; that is, you must specify "Series.Name" and "ChartArea.Name" expressions. 查看範例程式碼下方，如需此程序的範例。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 同樣地，如果使用多個圖表區域，屬性的所有繪製也必須先儲存。Similarly, if multiple chart areas are being used, the property of all plotted must also be saved. 某些情況下，屬性可以設為序列化和不序列化時，使用萬用字元時，這很常見。Sometimes, a property can be set to be both serialized and not serialized, which is common when wildcards are used. 運算式具有較低的優先權，相較於運算式。The expression has a lower priority when compared to the expression. 不過，請注意，較少的權重會使用萬用字元的字串運算式。However, note that less weight is given to string expressions that use wildcards. 例如，如果屬性設定為"\*。背景色彩 」 以及屬性設定為，所有 B`ackColor`屬性，但會將物件序列化。For example, if the property is set to "\*.BackColor" and the property is set to , all B`ackColor` properties except for objects will be serialized. 如果您設定屬性，屬性會在內部設定。If you set the property, the property will be set internally. 如果屬性已設定，但另一個屬性必須序列化，請務必串連屬性時指定該額外的屬性。If the property is already set but another property needs to be serialized, make sure to concatenate the property when specifying that extra property. 查看範例程式碼下方，如需此程序的範例。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 所有儲存時，這個屬性會影響載入及重設作業。This property affects all save, load and reset operations.
